channel.title: adidas on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in adidas on Rusland 1

item.title: GOPNIK AND THE SLAV SQUAT
item.description: Description Have you ever seen a Russian in a tracksuit ( Adidas or something resembling it), a beer bottle in hand, cigarette hanging from their lips, squatting with flat feet? Then you’ve likely spotted a true gopnik (m) or gopnitsa (f).

item.title: Adidas
item.description: Why Slavs wear Adidas (Life of Boris, 2016, 2 m) Also, check out this Eastern European vs. Life of Boris – Adidas Tracksuit (Eastern European, 2018, 3 m). Три полоски / Three stripes (Tri Poloski, 2016, 2 m)

item.title: Animal ДжаZ – Three Stripes
item.description: Jeans and Sneakers Джинсы порезаны: jeans cut. Лето: summer. Три полоски на кедах: three stripes on sneakers. Под теплым дождем: in the warm rain. There is also a lyrics version, a performance with Amatory, and one with Alai Oli .
